3076 if (g_handleattr_off_t(bp, "poolblocksused",
3077 refd / DEV_BSIZE))
3078 return;
3079 }
3080 /* FALLTHROUGH */
3081 }
3082 default:
3083 g_io_deliver(bp, EOPNOTSUPP);
3084 break;
3085 }
3086 return;
3087
3088enqueue:
3089 mtx_lock(&zv->zv_queue_mtx);
3090 first = (bioq_first(&zv->zv_queue) == NULL);
3091 bioq_insert_tail(&zv->zv_queue, bp);
3092 mtx_unlock(&zv->zv_queue_mtx);
3093 if (first)
3094 wakeup_one(&zv->zv_queue);
3095}
3096
3097static void
3098zvol_geom_worker(void *arg)
3099{
3100 zvol_state_t *zv;
3101 struct bio *bp;
3102
3103 thread_lock(curthread);
3104 sched_prio(curthread, PRIBIO);
3105 thread_unlock(curthread);
3106
3107 zv = arg;
3108 for (;;) {
3109 mtx_lock(&zv->zv_queue_mtx);
3110 bp = bioq_takefirst(&zv->zv_queue);
3111 if (bp == NULL) {
3112 if (zv->zv_state == 1) {
3113 zv->zv_state = 2;
3114 wakeup(&zv->zv_state);
3115 mtx_unlock(&zv->zv_queue_mtx);
3116 kthread_exit();
3117 }
3118 msleep(&zv->zv_queue, &zv->zv_queue_mtx, PRIBIO | PDROP,
3119 "zvol:io", 0);
3120 continue;
3121 }
3122 mtx_unlock(&zv->zv_queue_mtx);
3123 switch (bp->bio_cmd) {
3124 case BIO_FLUSH:
3125 zil_commit(zv->zv_zilog, ZVOL_OBJ);
3126 g_io_deliver(bp, 0);
3127 break;
3128 case BIO_READ:
3129 case BIO_WRITE:
3130 case BIO_DELETE:
3131 zvol_strategy(bp);
3132 break;
3133 default:
3134 g_io_deliver(bp, EOPNOTSUPP);
3135 break;
3136 }
3137 }
3138}
3139#endif
3140
3141extern boolean_t dataset_name_hidden(const char *name);
3142
3143static int
3144zvol_create_snapshots(objset_t *os, const char *name)
3145{
3146 uint64_t cookie, obj;
3147 char *sname;
3148 int error, len;
3149
3150 cookie = obj = 0;
3151 sname = kmem_alloc(MAXPATHLEN, KM_SLEEP);
3152
3153#if 0
3154 (void) dmu_objset_find(name, dmu_objset_prefetch, NULL,
3155 DS_FIND_SNAPSHOTS);
3156#endif
3157
3158 for (;;) {
3159 len = snprintf(sname, MAXPATHLEN, "%s@", name);
3160 if (len >= MAXPATHLEN) {
3161 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
3162 error = ENAMETOOLONG;
3163 break;
3164 }
3165
3166 dsl_pool_config_enter(dmu_objset_pool(os), FTAG);
3167 error = dmu_snapshot_list_next(os, MAXPATHLEN - len,
3168 sname + len, &obj, &cookie, NULL);
3169 dsl_pool_config_exit(dmu_objset_pool(os), FTAG);
3170 if (error != 0) {
3171 if (error == ENOENT)
3172 error = 0;
3173 break;
3174 }
3175
3176 error = zvol_create_minor(sname);
3177 if (error != 0 && error != EEXIST) {
3178 printf("ZFS WARNING: Unable to create ZVOL %s (error=%d).\n",
3179 sname, error);
3180 break;
3181 }
3182 }
3183
3184 kmem_free(sname, MAXPATHLEN);
3185 return (error);
3186}
3187
3188int
3189zvol_create_minors(const char *name)
3190{
3191 uint64_t cookie;
3192 objset_t *os;
3193 char *osname, *p;
3194 int error, len;
3195
3196 if (dataset_name_hidden(name))
3197 return (0);
3198
3199 if ((error = dmu_objset_hold(name, FTAG, &os)) != 0) {
3200 printf("ZFS WARNING: Unable to put hold on %s (error=%d).\n",
3201 name, error);
3202 return (error);
3203 }
3204 if (dmu_objset_type(os) == DMU_OST_ZVOL) {
3205 dsl_dataset_long_hold(os->os_dsl_dataset, FTAG);
3206 dsl_pool_rele(dmu_objset_pool(os), FTAG);
3207 error = zvol_create_minor(name);
3208 if (error == 0 || error == EEXIST) {
3209 error = zvol_create_snapshots(os, name);
3210 } else {
3211 printf("ZFS WARNING: Unable to create ZVOL %s (error=%d).\n",
3212 name, error);
3213 }
3214 dsl_dataset_long_rele(os->os_dsl_dataset, FTAG);
3215 dsl_dataset_rele(os->os_dsl_dataset, FTAG);
3216 return (error);
3217 }
3218 if (dmu_objset_type(os) != DMU_OST_ZFS) {
3219 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
3220 return (0);
3221 }
3222
3223 osname = kmem_alloc(MAXPATHLEN, KM_SLEEP);
3224 if (snprintf(osname, MAXPATHLEN, "%s/", name) >= MAXPATHLEN) {
3225 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
3226 kmem_free(osname, MAXPATHLEN);
3227 return (ENOENT);
3228 }
3229 p = osname + strlen(osname);
3230 len = MAXPATHLEN - (p - osname);
3231
3232#if 0
3233 /* Prefetch the datasets. */
3234 cookie = 0;
3235 while (dmu_dir_list_next(os, len, p, NULL, &cookie) == 0) {
3236 if (!dataset_name_hidden(osname))
3237 (void) dmu_objset_prefetch(osname, NULL);
3238 }
3239#endif
3240
3241 cookie = 0;
3242 while (dmu_dir_list_next(os, MAXPATHLEN - (p - osname), p, NULL,
3243 &cookie) == 0) {
3244 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
3245 (void)zvol_create_minors(osname);
3246 if ((error = dmu_objset_hold(name, FTAG, &os)) != 0) {
3247 printf("ZFS WARNING: Unable to put hold on %s (error=%d).\n",
3248 name, error);
3249 return (error);
3250 }
3251 }
3252
3253 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
3254 kmem_free(osname, MAXPATHLEN);
3255 return (0);
3256}
3257
3258#ifdef __NetBSD__
3259void
3260zvol_rename_minor(zvol_state_t *zv, const char *newname)
3261{
3262 char *nm;
3263 minor_t minor = zv->zv_minor;
3264
3265 nm = PNBUF_GET();
3266 strlcpy(nm, newname, MAXPATHLEN);
3267 ddi_remove_minor_node(zfs_dip, zv->zv_name);
3268 (void)ddi_create_minor_node(zfs_dip, nm, S_IFCHR, minor, DDI_PSEUDO, 0);
3269 (void)ddi_create_minor_node(zfs_dip, nm, S_IFBLK, minor, DDI_PSEUDO, 0);
3270 PNBUF_PUT(nm);
3271
3272 strlcpy(zv->zv_name, newname, sizeof(zv->zv_name));
3273 mutex_enter(&zv->zv_dklock);
3274 disk_rename(&zv->zv_dk, zv->zv_name);
3275 mutex_exit(&zv->zv_dklock);
3276}
3277#endif
3278
3279#ifdef __FreeBSD__
3280static void
3281zvol_rename_minor(zvol_state_t *zv, const char *newname)
3282{
3283 struct g_geom *gp;
3284 struct g_provider *pp;
3285 struct cdev *dev;
3286
3287 ASSERT(MUTEX_HELD(&zfsdev_state_lock));
3288
3289 if (zv->zv_volmode == ZFS_VOLMODE_GEOM) {
3290 g_topology_lock();
3291 pp = zv->zv_provider;
3292 ASSERT(pp != NULL);
3293 gp = pp->geom;
3294 ASSERT(gp != NULL);
3295
3296 zv->zv_provider = NULL;
3297 g_wither_provider(pp, ENXIO);
3298
3299 pp = g_new_providerf(gp, "%s/%s", ZVOL_DRIVER, newname);
3300 pp->flags |= G_PF_DIRECT_RECEIVE | G_PF_DIRECT_SEND;
3301 pp->sectorsize = DEV_BSIZE;
3302 pp->mediasize = zv->zv_volsize;
3303 pp->private = zv;
3304 zv->zv_provider = pp;
3305 g_error_provider(pp, 0);
3306 g_topology_unlock();
3307 } else if (zv->zv_volmode == ZFS_VOLMODE_DEV) {
3308 struct make_dev_args args;
3309
3310 if ((dev = zv->zv_dev) != NULL) {
3311 zv->zv_dev = NULL;
3312 destroy_dev(dev);
3313 if (zv->zv_total_opens > 0) {
3314 zv->zv_flags &= ~ZVOL_EXCL;
3315 zv->zv_total_opens = 0;
3316 zvol_last_close(zv);
3317 }
3318 }
3319
3320 make_dev_args_init(&args);
3321 args.mda_flags = MAKEDEV_CHECKNAME | MAKEDEV_WAITOK;
3322 args.mda_devsw = &zvol_cdevsw;
3323 args.mda_cr = NULL;
3324 args.mda_uid = UID_ROOT;
3325 args.mda_gid = GID_OPERATOR;
3326 args.mda_mode = 0640;
3327 args.mda_si_drv2 = zv;
3328 if (make_dev_s(&args, &zv->zv_dev,
3329 "%s/%s", ZVOL_DRIVER, newname) == 0)
3330 zv->zv_dev->si_iosize_max = MAXPHYS;
3331 }
3332 strlcpy(zv->zv_name, newname, sizeof(zv->zv_name));
3333}
3334#endif
3335
3336void
3337zvol_rename_minors(const char *oldname, const char *newname)
3338{
3339 char name[MAXPATHLEN];
3340 struct g_provider *pp;
3341 struct g_geom *gp;
3342 size_t oldnamelen, newnamelen;
3343 zvol_state_t *zv;
3344 char *namebuf;
3345 boolean_t locked = B_FALSE;
3346
3347 oldnamelen = strlen(oldname);
3348 newnamelen = strlen(newname);
3349
3350 DROP_GIANT();
3351 /* See comment in zvol_open(). */
3352 if (!MUTEX_HELD(&zfsdev_state_lock)) {
3353 mutex_enter(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3354 locked = B_TRUE;
3355 }
3356
3357 LIST_FOREACH(zv, &all_zvols, zv_links) {
3358 if (strcmp(zv->zv_name, oldname) == 0) {
3359 zvol_rename_minor(zv, newname);
3360 } else if (strncmp(zv->zv_name, oldname, oldnamelen) == 0 &&
3361 (zv->zv_name[oldnamelen] == '/' ||
3362 zv->zv_name[oldnamelen] == '@')) {
3363 snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s%c%s", newname,
3364 zv->zv_name[oldnamelen],
3365 zv->zv_name + oldnamelen + 1);
3366 zvol_rename_minor(zv, name);
3367 }
3368 }
3369
3370 if (locked)
3371 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3372 PICKUP_GIANT();
3373}
3374
3375#ifdef __FreeBSD__
3376static int
3377zvol_d_open(struct cdev *dev, int flags, int fmt, struct thread *td)
3378{
3379 zvol_state_t *zv = dev->si_drv2;
3380 int err = 0;
3381
3382 mutex_enter(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3383 if (zv->zv_total_opens == 0)
3384 err = zvol_first_open(zv);
3385 if (err) {
3386 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3387 return (err);
3388 }
3389 if ((flags & FWRITE) && (zv->zv_flags & ZVOL_RDONLY)) {
3390 err = SET_ERROR(EROFS);
3391 goto out;
3392 }
3393 if (zv->zv_flags & ZVOL_EXCL) {
3394 err = SET_ERROR(EBUSY);
3395 goto out;
3396 }
3397#ifdef FEXCL
3398 if (flags & FEXCL) {
3399 if (zv->zv_total_opens != 0) {
3400 err = SET_ERROR(EBUSY);
3401 goto out;
3402 }
3403 zv->zv_flags |= ZVOL_EXCL;
3404 }
3405#endif
3406
3407 zv->zv_total_opens++;
3408 if (flags & (FSYNC | FDSYNC)) {
3409 zv->zv_sync_cnt++;
3410 if (zv->zv_sync_cnt == 1)
3411 zil_async_to_sync(zv->zv_zilog, ZVOL_OBJ);
3412 }
3413 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3414 return (err);
3415out:
3416 if (zv->zv_total_opens == 0)
3417 zvol_last_close(zv);
3418 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3419 return (err);
3420}
3421
3422static int
3423zvol_d_close(struct cdev *dev, int flags, int fmt, struct thread *td)
3424{
3425 zvol_state_t *zv = dev->si_drv2;
3426
3427 mutex_enter(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3428 if (zv->zv_flags & ZVOL_EXCL) {
3429 ASSERT(zv->zv_total_opens == 1);
3430 zv->zv_flags &= ~ZVOL_EXCL;
3431 }
3432
3433 /*
3434 * If the open count is zero, this is a spurious close.
3435 * That indicates a bug in the kernel / DDI framework.
3436 */
3437 ASSERT(zv->zv_total_opens != 0);
3438
3439 /*
3440 * You may get multiple opens, but only one close.
3441 */
3442 zv->zv_total_opens--;
3443 if (flags & (FSYNC | FDSYNC))
3444 zv->zv_sync_cnt--;
3445
3446 if (zv->zv_total_opens == 0)
3447 zvol_last_close(zv);
3448
3449 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3450 return (0);
3451}
3452
3453static int
3454zvol_d_ioctl(struct cdev *dev, u_long cmd, caddr_t data, int fflag, struct thread *td)
3455{
3456 zvol_state_t *zv;
3457 rl_t *rl;
3458 off_t offset, length;
3459 int i, error;
3460 boolean_t sync;
3461
3462 zv = dev->si_drv2;
3463
3464 error = 0;
3465 KASSERT(zv->zv_total_opens > 0,
3466 ("Device with zero access count in zvol_d_ioctl"));
3467
3468 i = IOCPARM_LEN(cmd);
3469 switch (cmd) {
3470 case DIOCGSECTORSIZE:
3471 *(u_int *)data = DEV_BSIZE;
3472 break;
3473 case DIOCGMEDIASIZE:
3474 *(off_t *)data = zv->zv_volsize;
3475 break;
3476 case DIOCGFLUSH:
3477 zil_commit(zv->zv_zilog, ZVOL_OBJ);
3478 break;
3479 case DIOCGDELETE:
3480 if (!zvol_unmap_enabled)
3481 break;
3482
3483 offset = ((off_t *)data)[0];
3484 length = ((off_t *)data)[1];
3485 if ((offset % DEV_BSIZE) != 0 || (length % DEV_BSIZE) != 0 ||
3486 offset < 0 || offset >= zv->zv_volsize ||
3487 length <= 0) {
3488 printf("%s: offset=%jd length=%jd\n", __func__, offset,
3489 length);
3490 error = EINVAL;
3491 break;
3492 }
3493
3494 rl = zfs_range_lock(&zv->zv_znode, offset, length, RL_WRITER);
3495 dmu_tx_t *tx = dmu_tx_create(zv->zv_objset);
3496 error = dmu_tx_assign(tx, TXG_WAIT);
3497 if (error != 0) {
3498 sync = FALSE;
3499 dmu_tx_abort(tx);
3500 } else {
3501 sync = (zv->zv_objset->os_sync == ZFS_SYNC_ALWAYS);
3502 zvol_log_truncate(zv, tx, offset, length, sync);
3503 dmu_tx_commit(tx);
3504 error = dmu_free_long_range(zv->zv_objset, ZVOL_OBJ,
3505 offset, length);
3506 }
3507 zfs_range_unlock(rl);
3508 if (sync)
3509 zil_commit(zv->zv_zilog, ZVOL_OBJ);
3510 break;
3511 case DIOCGSTRIPESIZE:
3512 *(off_t *)data = zv->zv_volblocksize;
3513 break;
3514 case DIOCGSTRIPEOFFSET:
3515 *(off_t *)data = 0;
3516 break;
3517 case DIOCGATTR: {
3518 spa_t *spa = dmu_objset_spa(zv->zv_objset);
3519 struct diocgattr_arg *arg = (struct diocgattr_arg *)data;
3520 uint64_t refd, avail, usedobjs, availobjs;
3521
3522 if (strcmp(arg->name, "GEOM::candelete") == 0)
3523 arg->value.i = 1;
3524 else if (strcmp(arg->name, "blocksavail") == 0) {
3525 dmu_objset_space(zv->zv_objset, &refd, &avail,
3526 &usedobjs, &availobjs);
3527 arg->value.off = avail / DEV_BSIZE;
3528 } else if (strcmp(arg->name, "blocksused") == 0) {
3529 dmu_objset_space(zv->zv_objset, &refd, &avail,
3530 &usedobjs, &availobjs);
3531 arg->value.off = refd / DEV_BSIZE;
3532 } else if (strcmp(arg->name, "poolblocksavail") == 0) {
3533 avail = metaslab_class_get_space(spa_normal_class(spa));
3534 avail -= metaslab_class_get_alloc(spa_normal_class(spa));
3535 arg->value.off = avail / DEV_BSIZE;
3536 } else if (strcmp(arg->name, "poolblocksused") == 0) {
3537 refd = metaslab_class_get_alloc(spa_normal_class(spa));
3538 arg->value.off = refd / DEV_BSIZE;
3539 } else
3540 error = ENOIOCTL;
3541 break;
3542 }
3543 case FIOSEEKHOLE:
3544 case FIOSEEKDATA: {
3545 off_t *off = (off_t *)data;
3546 uint64_t noff;
3547 boolean_t hole;
3548
3549 hole = (cmd == FIOSEEKHOLE);
3550 noff = *off;
3551 error = dmu_offset_next(zv->zv_objset, ZVOL_OBJ, hole, &noff);
3552 *off = noff;
3553 break;
3554 }
3555 default:
3556 error = ENOIOCTL;
3557 }
3558
3559 return (error);
3560}
3561#endif /* __FreeBSD__ */
3562
3563#ifdef __NetBSD__
3564/*ARGSUSED*/
3565int
3566zvol_ioctl(dev_t dev, int cmd, intptr_t arg, int flag, cred_t *cr, int *rvalp)
3567{
3568 zvol_state_t *zv;
3569 int error = 0;
3570
3571 mutex_enter(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3572
3573 zv = zfsdev_get_soft_state(getminor(dev), ZSST_ZVOL);
3574
3575 if (zv == NULL) {
3576 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3577 return (ENXIO);
3578 }
3579
3580 error = disk_ioctl(&zv->zv_dk, NODEV, cmd, (void *)arg, flag, curlwp);
3581 if (error != EPASSTHROUGH) {
3582 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3583 return error;
3584 }
3585
3586 error = 0;
3587
3588 switch(cmd) {
3589 case DIOCGWEDGEINFO:
3590 {
3591 struct dkwedge_info *dkw = (void *) arg;
3592
3593 memset(dkw, 0, sizeof(*dkw));
3594 strlcpy(dkw->dkw_devname, zv->zv_name,
3595 sizeof(dkw->dkw_devname));
3596 strlcpy(dkw->dkw_parent, "ZFS", sizeof(dkw->dkw_parent));
3597
3598 dkw->dkw_offset = 0;
3599 dkw->dkw_size = zv->zv_volsize / DEV_BSIZE;
3600 strcpy(dkw->dkw_ptype, DKW_PTYPE_FFS);
3601
3602 break;
3603 }
3604
3605 default:
3606 dprintf("unknown disk_ioctl called\n");
3607 error = ENOTTY;
3608 break;
3609 }
3610
3611 mutex_exit(&zfsdev_state_lock);
3612 return (error);
3613}
3614#endif /* __NetBSD__ */
